LanguageData.SubcoreScannerAutoLoadDesc: Autoload this subscanner when your current number of subcores is below the threshold?
LanguageData.SubcoreScannerAutoAllowColonistsDesc: Allow colonists assigned to basic work to automatically enter this subscanner?
LanguageData.SubcoreScannerAutoAllowPrisonersDesc: Allow prisoners with the "{0}" interaction mode to automatically be carried to this subscanner?
